author: ROllerozxa
long_description:
This mod, [originally written by paramat](https://github.com/paramat/lvm_example/), serves as a basic example on how to write a performant Lua mapgen containing Perlin noise.

It optionally depends on [`biomegen`](https://content.minetest.net/packages/Gael%20de%20Sailly/biomegen/) which, if present, will decorate the mapgen with biomes and decorations.
name: lvm_example
short_description: A basic example for writing custom Lua mapgen using Perlin noise.
title: Example Lua mapgen
